channel.title: Aora - 718/742 - Iron Man /HC Iron Man - Vorago - Boss Pets
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/26Z7E2k.png[/img]
[I][SIZE=2]A new 718 RSPS, with many features[/SIZE][/I]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/runmLmL.png[/img][/CENTER] [URL=http://aora-ps.com]Homepage[/URL] [URL=http://aora-ps.com/AoraClient.jar]Play now[/URL] [URL=http://aora-ps.com/community]Community[/URL] [URL=http://aora-ps.com/highscores]Highscores[/URL] [URL=http://aora-ps.com/vote]Vote[/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GoRNXzs.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Features] [B][SIZE=5]Minigames[/SIZE][/B] -Barrows -Rise Of The Six -Warriors Guild -Duel Arena -Fight Caves -Fight Kiln -Dominion Tower -Clan Wars -Castle Wars -Recipe For Diaster -Pest Control -Fist Of Guthix -Soul Wars -The Hunger Games(Disabled)
[SIZE=5][B]Bosses[/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR="#000080"]- King Black Dragon - Bork - Kalphite Queen - Dagannoth Kings - Tormented Demons - Armadyl Lair - Bandos Lair - Saradomin Lair - Zamarok Lair - Glacors - Barrelchest [/COLOR] [B][COLOR="#FF0000"]Queen Black Dragon Corperal Beast Nex Wildy Wyrm Yk'lagor The Thunderous Blink Party Demon Vorago[/COLOR][/B]
[B][SIZE=5]Other Features[/SIZE][/B]
- Offhanded Weapons [B]- Iron Man / Hardcore Iron Man[/B] - Skill fu - 3 Donator Ranks [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/show-off/599872-zamorakian-falador.html"]- Amazing Themed home(Zamarokian)[/URL] - Lending out items - Grand Exchange - On spot duelling - Evil Tree - 120 Skillcape's ( 104m xp announcements) - 99 Announcements - 200m Announcements - Rare drop announcements - Completionist requirements - Bosses kill count - Puro Puro - Trivia with Trivia Store - Loyalty points for 30 minutes playing with store - Voting store - Notes - 100% working music system - All RS emotes - Almost every RS NPC Spawned - Skill bosses (Will appear while skilling) - Ecto-token system, Boss drops Ecto tokens so every kill will be worth it(Tradeable) - Boss pets - 24 Skills to train(Construction will be added soon) - Over 200 Custom items in cache will be used ingame soon - Clanning system with capes/vexillum - Full Toolbelt - Highscores - Many many more features i haven't listed yet [/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WTCaRg6.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tAXnaEx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WeczG3Y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yHsJhqE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TEFAwkA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EWi1dJ0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SqMKuzb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VFSwAHS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sbpbZbS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/auMoALT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Yy9QNsl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4RWDBkw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w9N0ivf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KSoKtyd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2RWoJCP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZwpsuXi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pbm6BH0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/C98o4FH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gjYuLMI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1i26qcc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9dQUMYW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KV13ceb.png[/img]
More media soon!
[/SPOILER][/CENTER]

item.title: Aora - 718/742 - Iron Man /HC Iron Man - Vorago - Boss Pets
item.dc:creator: @Aora Aora
item.description:
@Aora wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=2]A new 718 RSPS, with many features[/SIZE]

[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][CENTER][/CENTER]
Homepage
Play now
Community
Highscores
Vote

[SPOILER=Features]
[SIZE=5]Minigames[/SIZE]
-Barrows
-Rise Of The Six
-Warriors Guild
-Duel Arena
-Fight Caves
-Fight Kiln
-Dominion Tower
-Clan Wars
-Castle Wars
-Recipe For Diaster
-Pest Control
-Fist Of Guthix
-Soul Wars
-The Hunger Games(Disabled)

[SIZE=5]Bosses[/SIZE]

[COLOR="#000080"]- King Black Dragon

  • Bork
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Tormented Demons
  • Armadyl Lair
  • Bandos Lair
  • Saradomin Lair
  • Zamarok Lair
  • Glacors
  • Barrelchest
    [/COLOR]
    [COLOR="#FF0000"]Queen Black Dragon
    Corperal Beast
    Nex
    Wildy Wyrm
    Yk’lagor The Thunderous
    Blink
    Party Demon
    Vorago[/COLOR]

[SIZE=5]Other Features[/SIZE]

  • Offhanded Weapons
    - Iron Man / Hardcore Iron Man
  • Skill fu
  • 3 Donator Ranks
    - Amazing Themed home(Zamarokian)
  • Lending out items
  • Grand Exchange
  • On spot duelling
  • Evil Tree
  • 120 Skillcape’s ( 104m xp announcements)
  • 99 Announcements
  • 200m Announcements
  • Rare drop announcements
  • Completionist requirements
  • Bosses kill count
  • Puro Puro
  • Trivia with Trivia Store
  • Loyalty points for 30 minutes playing with store
  • Voting store
  • Notes
  • 100% working music system
  • All RS emotes
  • Almost every RS NPC Spawned
  • Skill bosses (Will appear while skilling)
  • Ecto-token system, Boss drops Ecto tokens so every kill will be worth it(Tradeable)
  • Boss pets
  • 24 Skills to train(Construction will be added soon)
  • Over 200 Custom items in cache will be used ingame soon
  • Clanning system with capes/vexillum
  • Full Toolbelt
  • Highscores
  • Many many more features i haven’t listed yet
    [/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Media]




EWi1dJ0.png750×400









2RWoJCP.png1009×558






9dQUMYW.png894×475

More media soon!

[/SPOILER][/CENTER]
